title: Interview with Specialized Tarmac SL8 product manager: ‘You can’t just have the most aero bike’
content:
Specialized road product manager Miles Hubbard talks about using Tarmac as a primary race bike, how the Tarmac is more aero than it looks, and more.

Read the full article at Interview with Specialized Tarmac SL8 product manager: ‘You can’t just have the most aero bike’ on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
